charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1101_0100_:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] came across
Rika and Clodsire standing by the riverside.
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1101_0200_:
Rika had been searching for an ideal place to
train Clodsire, but...
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_0400_: You don’t much care for this place after all, huh?
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_0500_:
If only there were a big marsh or swamp...
At this point I’d even take a pond.
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_0401_0800_: Wow, that’s great. Thanks for letting me know!
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_0302_0900_: I’ll show you a good spot!
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_0402_1000_: Really?! You know a good spot around here?
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_1200_:
I should’ve asked for your help from the get-go,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_1300_: Not just any ol’ puddle will do, y’know.
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_1400_:
I want to find a training spot for Clodsire where
he can really give his all.
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_1500_:
That, and I’ve gotta be careful about where I have
him practice his moves.
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_1600_:
Clodsire doesn’t have to try very hard to get the
ground shakin’—and if anyone’s nearby, they’re
gonna get knocked down...and STAY down.
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_0401_1800_:
Nahaha! That’s the reaction I was looking for!
You’re a riot, you know that?
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_0402_2000_:
Huh. Flatter reaction than I expected. Figured I’d
get SOME kinda rise outta you, at least.
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_2100_:
Anyway, I may have been exaggerating just a tad,
but it’s still important to be careful. Safety first
and all that.
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_2200_:
It’s not like I think Pasio’s so fragile that it’ll
collapse if a Pokémon gets too excited.
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_2300_:
We just can’t be sure what would happen if we
shook the ground in an enclosed space like a cave.
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_2400_:
All I’m trying to say is that we’ve gotta keep our
surroundings in mind when we’re practicing
powerful moves.
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_2500_:
Oh, you clever little guy, you! Picked up on what
I was sayin’, did you?
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_2600_: He’s so cute and round, don’t you think?
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_2700_:
Don’t let that fool you, though—if he’s attacked by
an enemy, he’ll stick out these thick spines to
retaliate.
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_2800_: Even the cutest Clodsire has thorns...
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_2900_: Pokémon have so many different sides to them.
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_3000_:
And tell you what, people could learn a thing or
two from that. Keeping certain things secret could
really come in handy someday.
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_3100_:
Take you, for example... Maybe you’ve got a
hidden side behind that smiling face of yours.
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_3200_:
I can tell we’re gonna be friends for a long time,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0302_00_chiri/2301_1201_3300_:
I’ll keep an eye on how many sides of you I can
catch.
